page.title: 09 Duston Folk & Community Ctr
page.content: The centre, built on the site of Duston Upper School, is operated by the School Head with the Deputy Head having special responsibility for Adult Education and Youth and Community activities. The varied facilities include a swimming pool; rooms for playgroups & Mother and Toddler groups; a hall which may be hired privately for dances and wedding receptions and a Sports Hall & Playing Fields. The latter are always fully booked and used by 34 outside groups. Payment is asked for on a monthly basis. A Senior Citizens' Luncheon Club is held monthly, while a Youth Club operates each evening with an average attendance of 70. The Duke of Edinburgh Awards Scheme is operated.
